attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop foreign lorry drivers using our roads without paying road tax. Check all fuel tanks before leaving british ports.Make them fill up in the uk.More law enforcement. (on the spot fines)

rejection.details:
Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.

Also, similar petitions already exist, for example:

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Foreign-car-tax/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ForeignLorries/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
